channel.title: Task2s on ICASSP 2026: Automatic Song Aesthetics Evaluation Challenge
channel.description: Recent content in Task2s on ICASSP 2026: Automatic Song Aesthetics Evaluation Challenge

item.title: Test Set Track 2
item.description: Track 2: Fine-Grained Aesthetic Dimension Prediction For Track 2, we have included a number of special samples designed to test model sensitivity to individual aesthetic dimensions. Each of these samples exhibits degradation in only one or two specific dimensions rather than an overall aesthetic drop, encouraging more fine-grained prediction capability. Download link:https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1nAx25FC1xDhi5CDabrCivjVoeO3IgT2d?usp=sharing

item.title: Track 2: Fine-Grained Aesthetic Dimension Prediction
item.description: Description This track challenges participants to predict five specific aesthetic dimensions for each song, including: Overall Coherence Memorability Naturalness of Vocal Breathing and Phrasing Clarity of Song Structure Overall Musicality Each track will emphasize different aspects of song aesthetics to encourage detailed and holistic models for music evaluation.
